Title: Jinzou Konchuu Kabutoborg VxV
Description: ['BorgBattles between KabutoBorgs have become popular enough to hold world tournaments. The main character Ryuusei is an enthusiast of these battles. Along with his friends Katsuji and Ken, he continues fighting against new enemies day after day.']
Staff: [['Ishiodori, Hiroshi', 'Director, Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Koizumi, Kisuke', 'Sound Director'], ['Matsushita, Yoko', 'Executive Producer'], ['Yamatoya, Akatsuki', 'Series Composition']]
